items.sentence: Tom's inattention at the wheel cost him his life.
Tom didn't tell us who taught him how to do that.
I'd rather go take a walk than go see that movie.
The man who is driving the bus is my best friend.
I'll give you this bicycle as a birthday present.
I'm sorry for not replying to your email earlier.
I'm in none of the pictures, because I took them.
I'm afraid I'm not familiar with that expression.
Tom didn't open the windows like we asked him to.
Is it true Tom was able to swim across the river?
